name: Thaumaturge
description: The world is full of the unexplainable: ancient magic, dead gods, and even stranger things. In response, you've scavenged the best parts of every magical tradition and built up a collection of esoterica—a broken holy relic here, a sprig of mistletoe there—that you can use to best any creature by exploiting their weaknesses and vulnerabilities.

name: Thaumaturge Archetype
description: Scraps of knowledge have taught you how to exploit the vulnerabilities of creatures and the powers of mystical objects.
